title: Judith Summerfield
deck: I’m married with two grown up daughters, 3 cats, and a tank of tropical fish. I’ve been a member of Gateway since 1990. You will often find me serving tea and coffee on a Sunday morning. I have the privilege of leading the new day time Lifegroup and being part of the team teaching the Sunday morning teenage group. I enjoy gardening and reading when I am not looking after my menagerie or working.
